profileSummary: Embedded Systems Engineer with 2+ years of experience developing firmware and secure cloud connectivity solutions for ABB's award-winning industrial IoT gateway platform (EGW-02, Red Dot Award winner). Specialized in real-time embedded systems, industrial communication protocols (OPC UA, MQTT, CAN), and mission-critical firmware development for factory automation and drive systems. Proven track record in architecting scalable embedded Linux solutions on Yocto-based platforms, implementing TPM-based security, and delivering 99.9% uptime systems. Expert in C/C++, ARM Cortex-M, and end-to-end embedded development from bare-metal to cloud integration, with strong focus on performance optimization and industrial-grade reliability. % ==================== PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE ====================

experience.title: Associate R&D Engineer - Embedded Software Engineer
experience.company: ABB Global Industries and Services Pvt. Ltd.
bullets: Architected secure cloud connectivity for industrial drives using TPM and certificate authentication, enabling predictive maintenance and reducing downtime by 30%

Created multithreaded data aggregation pipelines for telemetry and events, optimizing memory and reducing bandwidth
Implemented Azure IoT Hub integration with device provisioning, twin sync, and secure file upload for remote management
Performed system bring-up, UART/I2C debugging, and collaborated with firmware/hardware teams for integration
Established test frameworks with Google Test and CMake achieving 80%+ coverage; integrated HIL testing
Optimized data pipelines achieving 40% throughput improvement and 99.9% uptime through robust error handling
